content: श्रेष्ठ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Best, most excellent, pre-eminent (with <ab>gen.</ab> or <ab>loc.</ab>). {@--2@} Most happy or prosperous. {@--3@} Most beloved, dearest. {@--4@} Oldest, senior. --ष्ठः {@--1@} A Brāhmaṇa. {@--2@} A king. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of Kubera. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu. --ष्ठं Cow's milk.
